entity.name: pgsql_db
entity.query: SELECT int_id AS id, date_entered, date_updated, ttrss_entries.title AS title, link, content, ttrss_feeds.title AS feed_title, site_url, marked, score, published, unread, note, author, ttrss_feeds.owner_uid, ttrss_feed_categories.title AS feed_category FROM ttrss_users INNER JOIN ttrss_feeds ON ttrss_users.id = ttrss_feeds.owner_uid LEFT OUTER JOIN ttrss_feed_categories ON ttrss_feed_categories.id = ttrss_feeds.cat_id , ttrss_entries, ttrss_user_entries WHERE ref_id = ttrss_entries.id AND feed_id = ttrss_feeds.id
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT int_id AS id, date_entered, date_updated, ttrss_entries.title AS title, link, content, ttrss_feeds.title AS feed_title, site_url, marked, score, published, unread, note, author, ttrss_feeds.owner_uid, ttrss_feed_categories.title AS feed_category FROM ttrss_users INNER JOIN ttrss_feeds ON ttrss_users.id = ttrss_feeds.owner_uid LEFT OUTER JOIN ttrss_feed_categories ON ttrss_feed_categories.id = ttrss_feeds.cat_id , ttrss_entries, ttrss_user_entries WHERE ref_id = ttrss_entries.id AND feed_id = ttrss_feeds.id AND int_id = '${dih.delta.id}'
